source.citation: Medeiros, J. 1992. Harvesting Lodgepole Pine in Partial Cuts (Steyr KP40 & Case 1187B/Denis processor evaluations). FERIC Technical Report TR-106.
notes: Operation A: Case 1187B carrier with Denis stroke delimber-slasher processing roadside decks in lodgepole pine shelterwood blocks (Oct-Nov 1988 vs. Feb 1989 operators).

Operation B: Steyr KP40 processors mounted on multiple carriers (Cat 225, Link-Belt L-2800, Cat EL180) working low-volume pine stands—Table 11/12 report utilisation and short-term productivity ranges.

scenarios.name: case1187_octnov
scenarios.description: Case 1187B + Denis stroke delimber (Oct–Nov 1988) with new operators handling high-snags decks.
notes: Based on Table 10 averages for studies 1–3 (snag-rich decks, inexperienced operators).

scenarios.name: case1187_feb
scenarios.description: Case 1187B + Denis stroke delimber (Feb 1989) after operator experience and windrow prep improvements.
notes: Table 10 averages for studies 4–6 (experienced operators, minimal snags).

scenarios.name: kp40_caterpillar225
scenarios.description: Steyr KP40 on Caterpillar 225 carrier (Operation B) – Table 11/12 averages with 68% utilisation.
notes: Productivity derived from Table 12 averages; utilisation from Table 11 (Caterpillar 225 carrier).

scenarios.name: kp40_linkbelt_l2800
scenarios.description: Steyr KP40 on Link-Belt L-2800 carrier, similar short-log prescription (69% utilisation).
notes: Uses the same short-term per-PMH stats as the Caterpillar carrier; only utilisation differs (Table 11).

scenarios.name: kp40_caterpillar_el180
scenarios.description: Steyr KP40 on Caterpillar EL180 carrier with higher shift utilisation (76%).
notes: Shift composition follows Table 11 for the EL180 carrier; short-term productivity from Table 12 averages.
